name: AndroidWorld
description: Interactive benchmark for smartphone UI control requiring agents to operate Android apps via screenshots and action traces.

metrics.name: success_rate
metrics.definition: Percentage of tasks completed within the allowed step budget

test_method: Run the AndroidWorld environment with the provided emulator. Supply screen captures and metadata to the model, then execute actions via accessibility APIs.
notes: Report action budget and whether demonstrations or planner assistance were used. Logging UI hierarchies improves reproducibility.
